CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( EOI_Status__c , "Published"), "üîµ Published", IF( ISPICKVAL(EOI_Status__c, "Closed"), "üîµ Closed", IF( ISBLANK(Next_Step_Date_Time__c), "‚ò¢Ô∏è No Steps", IF( DATEVALUE(Next_Step_Date_Time__c) < TODAY(), "üî¥ Outdated Step", "üü¢ Step on time" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Next Step Date Validation
